metadata.title: Human Agency Must Guide The Future Of AI, Not Existential Fear
metadata.description: Human agency in AI is not optional. This article argues that despite rapid advances, humans can and should preserve authority over powerful systems as they evolve.
metadata.author: Paulo Carvão
metadata.keywords: AI human agency,AI governance,AI existential risk,AI alignment,AI safety,advanced AI systems,future of AI,AI oversight,AI policy
